Instance.description: A picker interaction that builds a list of target markets that a Sim can choose from in the lifestyle brand settings.

TunableList.name: target_markets
TunableList.description: A list of all the tuning needed for the different target markets for the lifestyle brand Perk

TunableTuple.description: A Target Market consists of a type, name, and icon to be displayed.

TunableTuple.name: icon
TunableTuple.description: The icon image to be displayed.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The icon image to be displayed.

Tunable.name: name
Tunable.description: The name of the target market that is displayed in the picker.

TunableEnum.name: target_type
TunableEnum.description: The type of target market this is associated with.
